meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>bone</radical>s <radical>have</radical> a <radical>scooter</radical> that moves through the <kanji>bone marrow</kanji> inside them.
readingMnemonic: If you put your ear really close to a bone with <kanji>marrow</kanji> still in it, you'll hear the scooters going <reading>zuwee</reading> (ずい) as they move the blood around inside there.
